edu.hm.shareit.mediaService

Interface MediaService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MediaServiceImplementation

    public interface MediaService
    A MediaService interface for Books and Discs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MediaServiceResult addBook(Book book)
      Add a new Book with Author Title and an unique ISBN to the Books-list.
      MediaServiceResult addDisc(Disc disc)
      Add a new Disc with Director, Title, Fsk and a unique Barcode to the Discs-list.
      Medium getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
      Get a Medium which is a book matching with the isbn.
      Medium[] getBooks()
      Get a Medium array that contains all books.
      Medium getDisc(java.lang.String barcode)
      Get a Medium which is a disc matching with the barcode.
      Medium[] getDiscs()
      Get a Medium array that contains all discs.
      MediaServiceResult updateBook(Book book)
      Update Author and/or Title of a book with given ISBN.
      MediaServiceResult updateDisc(Disc disc)
      Update Director, Fsk and/or Title of a book with given Barcode.

    • Method Detail

      • addBook

        MediaServiceResult addBook(Book book)
        Add a new Book with Author Title and an unique ISBN to the Books-list.
        Parameters:
        book - The book to add
        Returns:
        MediaServiceResult, whether the book was added successfully

      • addDisc

        MediaServiceResult addDisc(Disc disc)
        Add a new Disc with Director, Title, Fsk and a unique Barcode to the Discs-list.
        Parameters:
        disc - The disc to add
        Returns:
        MediaServiceResult, whether the disc was added successfully

      • getBooks

        Medium[] getBooks()
        Get a Medium array that contains all books.
        Returns:
        books The books

      • getDiscs

        Medium[] getDiscs()
        Get a Medium array that contains all discs.
        Returns:
        discs The discs

      • updateBook

        MediaServiceResult updateBook(Book book)
        Update Author and/or Title of a book with given ISBN. ISBN cannot be changed.
        Parameters:
        book - The book that has to be updated
        Returns:
        whether the book was updated successfully

      • updateDisc

        MediaServiceResult updateDisc(Disc disc)
        Update Director, Fsk and/or Title of a book with given Barcode.
        Parameters:
        disc - The disc that has to be updated
        Returns:
        whether the disc was updated successfully

      • getBook

        Medium getBook(java.lang.String isbn)
        Get a Medium which is a book matching with the isbn.
        Parameters:
        isbn - The book that shall be returned
        Returns:
        The requested book or null if not found.

      • getDisc

        Medium getDisc(java.lang.String barcode)
        Get a Medium which is a disc matching with the barcode.
        Parameters:
        barcode - The disc that shall be returned
        Returns:
        The requested disc or null if not found.
